charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1101_0100:
When [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking
through town, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard echoes of cool
guitar-like sounds.
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_0200:
Nice beat, Toxtricity! I’ll be counting on you for the
live show, too!
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_0400: Were you following the sound of Toxtricity’s chest?
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_0500:
Actually, until just now, I was practicing the bass
for the live show with Piers!
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_0600:
You train with amazing people, right? I was
getting passionate, and apparently Toxtricity
was as well.
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_0700:
It was challenging because she kept strumming
on her chest while I was performing. It’s fine,
’cause she seemed like she was having fun.
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_0800:
And what you see right now is that her excitement
has yet to cool down!
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_0301_0900: Is your practice coming along well?
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_0401_1100:
Oh, are you curious about how a Pokémon can
actually perform?
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_0302_1200: Is Toxtricity going to perform too?
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_0402_1300:
Are you curious about how a Pokémon can
actually perform?
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_1400:
Well, of course they can’t perform like people, but
music is all about the heart!
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_1500:
People and Pokémon can’t talk to each other, but
you don’t need words for music!
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_1600:
In fact, we jam really well, like with the practice
we just had!
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_1700:
On top of that, she’s been practicing with Piers’s
Toxtricity! Our songs are coming along nicely!
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_1800:
Piers and I have different musicality, and the same
goes for each of our Toxtricity, but...
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_1900: when we jam together, it oddly works really well!
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_0401_2100:
Oh, very sharp of you to notice,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_2500: I got my Toxel from Piers, but...
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_2600:
unlike Piers’s, who evolved into Low Key Form,
mine evolved into Amped Form!
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_2700:
I guess that’s the result of music allowing us to
communicate without words.
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_2800: Music is way more fun together with Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_2900:
As a Gym Leader, I want to tell the world that you
can have fun with Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_3000: That’s why I take my music and battling seriously!
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_3500:
Since you can relate to my musicality, maybe
you’re not too bad yourself,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_3600:
Oh yeah! If you have a chance, try raising
a Toxel!
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_3700:
I’m interested in what form it’ll evolve into
with your musicality!
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_3800: And if it grows up healthy...
charaepi_ch0011_10_homika/2301_1201_3900: Let’s rock the audience outta their seats together!
